scripts.client:build: cd client && npm ci --dev && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.server:build: cd server && npm ci --dev && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.prebuild: cd client && npm ci --dev && npm run build && cd ../ && cd server && npm ci --dev && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.start: npm run prebuild && cd server && npm start && ../client && npm run build
scripts.dev: cd server && npm run dev && cd ../
scripts.assets: cd client && npm run start && cd ../
